verses.verse: בְּךָֽ־ יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> In thee O LORD חָסִ֑יתִי <WH2620> do I put my trust אַל־ <WH408> nay אֵב֥וֹשָׁה <WH954> be put to confusion לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> In

בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֗ <WH6666> me in thy righteousness תַּצִּילֵ֥נִי <WH5337> Deliver וּֽתְפַלְּטֵ֑נִי <WH6403> and cause me to escape הַטֵּֽה־ <WH5186> incline אֵלַ֥י <WH413> about אָ֝זְנְךָ֗ <WH241> thine ear וְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> unto me and save

הֱיֵ֤ה <WH1961> become לִ֨י ׀ לְצ֥וּר <WH6697> Be thou my strong מָע֡וֹן <WH4583> habitation לָב֗וֹא <WH935> resort תָּמִ֗יד <WH8548> whereunto I may continually צִוִּ֥יתָ <WH6680> thou hast given commandment לְהוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <WH3467> to save כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for סַלְעִ֖י <WH5553> me for thou [art] my rock וּמְצוּדָתִ֣י <WH4686> and my fortress אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> O

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <WH430> me O my God פַּ֭לְּטֵנִי <WH6403> Deliver מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hand רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> of the wicked מִכַּ֖ף <WH3709> out of the hand מְעַוֵּ֣ל <WH5765> of the unrighteous וְחוֹמֵץ׃ <WH2556> and cruel man

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You תִקְוָתִ֑י <WH8615> For thou [art] my hope אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> O Lord יְ֝הוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD מִבְטַחִ֥י <WH4009> [thou art] my trust מִנְּעוּרָֽי׃ <WH5271> from my youth

עָלֶ֤יךָ ׀ <WH5921> and נִסְמַ֬כְתִּי <WH5564> By thee have I been holden up מִבֶּ֗טֶן <WH990> from the womb מִמְּעֵ֣י <WH4578> bowels אִ֭מִּי <WH517> me out of my mother's אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> who גוֹזִ֑י <WH1491> thou art he that took בְּךָ֖ תְהִלָּתִ֣י <WH8416> my praise תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> [shall be] continually
כְּ֭מוֹפֵת <WH4159> I am as a wonder הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> have become לְרַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> unto many וְ֝אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you מַֽחֲסִי־ <WH4268> refuge עֹֽז׃ <WH5797> but thou [art] my strong
יִמָּ֣לֵא <WH4390> be filled פִ֭י <WH6310> Let my mouth תְּהִלָּתֶ֑ךָ <WH8416> [with] thy praise כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> all the day תִּפְאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH8597> [and with] thy honour

אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּ֭שְׁלִיכֵנִי <WH7993> Cast me not off לְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> in the time זִקְנָ֑ה <WH2209> of old age כִּכְל֥וֹת <WH3615> faileth כֹּ֝חִ֗י <WH3581> me not when my strength אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעַזְבֵֽנִי׃ <WH5800> forsake

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָמְר֣וּ <WH559> speak אוֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> For mine enemies לִ֑י וְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> against me and they that lay wait נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> for my soul נוֹעֲצ֥וּ <WH3289> take counsel יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together

לֵ֭אמֹר <WH559> Saying אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God עֲזָב֑וֹ <WH5800> hath forsaken רִֽדְפ֥וּ <WH7291> him persecute וְ֝תִפְשׂ֗וּהוּ <WH8610> and take כִּי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> him for [there is] none to deliver

אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God אַל־ <WH408> not תִּרְחַ֣ק <WH7368> be not far מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> from me O my God לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <WH5833> for my help [חִישָׁה כ] (חֽוּשָׁה׃ <WH2363> haste ק)

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <WH954> Let them be confounded יִכְלוּ֮ <WH3615> [and] consumed שֹׂטְנֵ֪י <WH7853> that are adversaries נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> to my soul יַֽעֲט֣וּ <WH5844> let them be covered חֶ֭רְפָּה <WH2781> [with] reproach וּכְלִמָּ֑ה <WH3639> and dishonour מְ֝בַקְשֵׁ֗י <WH1245> that seek רָעָתִֽי׃ <WH7451> my hurt

וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> I תָּמִ֣יד <WH8548> continually אֲיַחֵ֑ל <WH3176> But I will hope וְ֝הוֹסַפְתִּ֗י <WH3254> thee more עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8416> and will yet praise

פִּ֤י ׀ <WH6310> My mouth יְסַפֵּ֬ר <WH5608> shall shew forth צִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ <WH6666> thy righteousness כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> all the day תְּשׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ <WH8668> [and] thy salvation כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֖א <WH3808> not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> for I know סְפֹרֽוֹת׃ <WH5615> not the numbers

אָב֗וֹא <WH935> I will go in בִּ֭גְבֻרוֹת <WH1369> the strength אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD אַזְכִּ֖יר <WH2142> I will make mention צִדְקָתְךָ֣ <WH6666> of thy righteousness לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH905> alone

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God לִמַּדְתַּ֥נִי <WH3925> thou hast taught מִנְּעוּרָ֑י <WH5271> me from my youth וְעַד־ <WH5704> against הֵ֝֗נָּה <WH2008> here אַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> and hitherto have I declared נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6381> thy wondrous works

וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> and even עַד־ <WH5704> Now also when זִקְנָ֨ה ׀ <WH2209> I am old וְשֵׂיבָה֮ <WH7872> and grayheaded אֱלֹהִ֪ים <WH430> O God אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעַ֫זְבֵ֥נִי <WH5800> forsake עַד־ <WH5704> Until אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> me not until I have shewed זְרוֹעֲךָ֣ <WH2220> thy strength לְד֑וֹר <WH1755> unto [this] generation לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all יָ֝ב֗וֹא <WH935> to every one [that] is to come גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1369> [and] thy power

וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> Thy righteousness אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> also O God עַד־ <WH5704> to מָ֫ר֥וֹם <WH4791> [is] very high אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> who hast done גְדֹל֑וֹת <WH1419> great things אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God מִ֣י <WH4310> who כָמֽוֹךָ׃ <WH3644> is like

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who [הִרְאִיתַנוּ כ] (הִרְאִיתַ֨נִי <WH7200> advise self ק) צָר֥וֹת <WH6869> troubles רַבּ֗וֹת <WH7227> me great וְרָ֫ע֥וֹת <WH7451> and sore תָּשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> me again [תְּחַיֵּינוּ כ] (תְּחַיֵּ֑ינִי <WH2421> keep leave ק) וּֽמִתְּהֹמ֥וֹת <WH8415> from the depths הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תָּשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> again תַּעֲלֵֽנִי׃ <WH5927> and shalt bring me up
תֶּ֤רֶב ׀ <WH7235> Thou shalt increase גְּֽדֻלָּתִ֗י <WH1420> my greatness וְתִסֹּ֥ב <WH5437> me on every side תְּֽנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃ <WH5162> and comfort

גַּם־ <WH1571> will also אֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I אוֹדְךָ֣ <WH3034> I will also praise בִכְלִי־ <WH3627> with נֶבֶל֮ <WH5035> A harp אֲמִתְּךָ֪ <WH571> [even] thy truth אֱלֹ֫הָ֥י <WH430> O my God אֲזַמְּרָ֣ה <WH2167> unto thee will I sing לְךָ֣ בְכִנּ֑וֹר <WH3658> with the harp קְ֝ד֗וֹשׁ <WH6918> O thou Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

תְּרַנֵּ֣נָּ֣ה <WH7442> shall greatly rejoice שְׂ֭פָתַי <WH8193> My lips כִּ֣י <WH3588> when אֲזַמְּרָה־ <WH2167> when I sing לָּ֑ךְ וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> unto thee and my soul אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which פָּדִֽיתָ׃ <WH6299> which thou hast redeemed

גַּם־ <WH1571> also לְשׁוֹנִ֗י <WH3956> My tongue כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> all the day תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> also shall talk צִדְקָתֶ֑ךָ <WH6666> of thy righteousness כִּי־ <WH3588> for בֹ֥שׁוּ <WH954> long for they are confounded כִֽי־ <WH3588> for חָ֝פְר֗וּ <WH2659> for they are brought unto shame מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <WH1245> that seek רָעָתִֽי׃ <WH7451> my hurt
